title: Meiosis in mammal cells with 5 answer options

content.question: Which of the following best describes the cells that result from the process of meiosis in mammals?

choices.label: They can be used to repair injuries.
They are genetically different from the parent cell.
They are genetically identical to all the other cells in the body.
They are identical to each other.

content.answer: They are genetically different from the parent cell.
